concept.title: 39.201 ICT accessibility standards for indefinite-quantity contracts.

li.p: (a) Confirming an exception (see 39.104-4) or determining an exemption (see 39.104-5) is not required before awarding of an indefinite-quantity contract, except for requirements that the initial award is to satisfy.

(b) The contract must identify which supplies and services the contractor indicates as compliant and show where to find full details of compliance (e.g., a contractor may provide a link to a vendorâ€™s website identifying supplies or services that are fully compliant with ICT accessibility standards.
